name: Stars
description: 《Stars》is a VR game about stars. you can completely relax, look up at the sky and listen to the story of each constellation.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290
